items.sentence: I still have some things to do before I can leave.
If people want to do it on their own, that's fine.
Tom put his head down on the desk and fell asleep.

When I walked into the room, they stopped talking.
Tom will very likely be the last student to leave.
This part of the river is too shallow for a canoe.
I'm afraid that we're going to be late for school.
I'm sorry I couldn't live up to your expectations.
I don't think that any more students want to come.
He told us such a funny story that we all laughed.
I don't hate you anymore. Now you just disgust me.
What Tom said to me felt like a shot to the heart.
I need to take another package to the post office.
Tom isn't the kind of guy you'd want to mess with.
I promised your parents that I'd take care of you.
